title: How to Hook Up a PlayStation 4 to a TV

steps.headline: Locate the HDMI out port on the back of the console.
Plug in an HDMI cable into the HDMI port on the PlayStation 4.
Locate an HDMI in port on your television.
steps.description: Plug the other end of the HDMI cable in.

steps.headline: Plug in the power for the PlayStation console.
Switch the TV to the input source your PlayStation 4 is running to.
steps.description: The button for this is often labeled "Source" or "Input" on your TV remote. Once you pick the right source, you should see the PS4 screen pop up.

text: Locate the HDMI out port on the back of the console.  Plug in an HDMI cable into the HDMI port on the PlayStation 4.  Locate an HDMI in port on your television. Plug the other end of the HDMI cable in. Plug in the power for the PlayStation console. Turn on the console. Switch the TV to the input source your PlayStation 4 is running to. The button for this is often labeled "Source" or "Input" on your TV remote. Once you pick the right source, you should see the PS4 screen pop up.
